name: Smile Inc.
description:
FOR WINDOWS. OTHER VERSIONS ARE ON MY GAMEJOLT.
https://gamejolt.com/games/SMILEINC/653240

Here at Smile Inc, we value our employee's mental health. That's why we're giving you an all-expenses-paid mental checkup and rehabilitation. I know you're going through a tough time right now, but work must be done.

Come down to the rehabilitation room. This is an order and not a request. Failure to compile will result in termination.

Sign~ Smile Inc.

(Journey through your own mind to remove... "undesirable aspects"... so that you can be a better employee for Smile Inc.)
